activities.loc: Grant County Courthouse - Br. I - 3rd Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Luke Kleiber

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Joseph Luke Kleiber in court.  Attorney Robert F Nagel appeared by video for Joseph Luke Kleiber.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Court heard on defendant not having Attorney Nagel retained in this case and 22CF117. Court questions on how to proceed. Attorney Riniker heard and wants to set 21CF241 for trial. Attorney Nagel heard. Defendant heard on retaining Attorney Nagel, has been sick so hasn't been able to get payment to him. Court heard. Status and trial date set. Trial date: January 4, 2023 or January 5, 2023.
Status conference scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 26, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Joseph Luke Kleiber appeared by video.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nagel is still not retained in this case. Attorney Riniker heard. Attorney Nagel says defendant is pretty close to having him retained. Defendant heard on plan to have Attorney Nagel retained. Court heard on total amount of restitution requested in the 4 pending Grant County cases and if the restitution amount will be obtained in a reasonable amount of time. Attorney Nagel heard on what is being disputed in regards to restitution and what the plan for repayment is. Court heard and sets another status date. If defendant does not have Attorney Nagel retained in this case and 22CF117, defendant to appear in person.
Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Attorney Nagel heard, defendant is staying making payments towards the retainer. Defendant heard and needs 14 more days to have retainer in full. Status date set.
Status conference scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Joseph Luke Kleiber in court.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant still has not retained Attorney Nagel for this matter. Is currently making payments on the retained fee. Defendant believes he have the retainer fee paid within 40 days. Status date set.
